about_the_game:
SpyGuys is an action packed Stealth game where you hunt down up to 7 other players in the Messiest most chaotic way possible.

Messy? Chaotic? This doesnt sound very spy-like?

Blending into the crowds is a tough job, but with enough bloodshed you'll vanish into the chaos before anyone can track you down.

Find the Killer

From Revolvers to Poison to Bombs, Use ANY weapons you can find or be forced to run away.

In a crowd of hundreds, up to 8 players are hidden in the masses only sticking out when mistakes are made. Loud gunshots and Bloody footprints are both your worst enemy and your greatest ally as they shape your enemies attention.


Trick your Friends

Be warned as every action that makes you stand out, can reward you with a quick death.

Lay fake loot around the map and fool your enemies by forcing them to waste their time as you prepare traps and disasters for them to step in the second they let down their guard. With a variety of tools at your disposal you can manipulate the enviroment around you forcing a move on your possibly invisible enemy.

Lots of Perks and Curses

Upgrade your character making the game much easier. or MUCH HARDER.

Unlock Perks by leveling up and use them to get the edge on your opponent. With supersonic hearing or dangerously good smell, your enemy will never expect your next move. Curses allow you to gain lots more exp during the match but cripple you heavily with an incredible variety of debuffs such as being haunted by the bodies you drop.

short_description: Travel through time blending into different lives as you hunt for fakes in the crowd. Chaos slowly takes control as you learn to shoot first, and face the consequences later.
